alert.note: Alert for Kaibab Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 24 at 3:12AM MST until December 25 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST SATURDAY ABOVE 7500 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow above 7500 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches with totals up to 1-2 ft above 8000 ft. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 7500 feet near Jacob Lake. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Additional snow forecast from 3 AM Today to 11 AM Saturday: Jacob Lake 5 to 9 inches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
